p: According to the results of comparison, sequence analysis, 99.0% to 99.7% genetic similarity was observed between Sri Lankan DENV-2 cosmopolitan Clade 1b isolates to same clade of DENV-2 reported from Singapore during 2016 to 2017 with 99.1% to 100% similarity in amino acid sequences. The evidence suggests recent introduction of this virus strain into Sri Lanka.
